reviews.review: Si quieren una partida tras otra de cheaters, acá lo tienen. Un juego lleno de gente sin manos pensando que son buenos usando hacks y VALVE que no hace nada, solo saca pases PEDORROS y la gente sin cerebro va comprarlo.

CS:GO used to be one of the most fun games I played for a while. I had around 800 hours of gameplay before I started realizing that valve doesnt really own this game.... the hackers do. It's hard to blame them tbh since valve anti-cheat methods are extremely outdated and equivalent to a slap on the wrist.

It was disheartning to see my rank go down from my well deserved MGE all the way back to silver due to matching with cheaters every 2 - 3 games. Walling, Spinbotting, B-hopping, you name it and its gonna be present. The cycle of hacking makes you lose faith in the system and eventually you WILL end up saying "If you cant beat them...join them".

I hacked alright and designated myself as an Hacker policeman only problem is my dumbass used my main account. Its been almost 3 years since my ban and I'd do it again since valve hasnt improved their security at all. I know that because I still play the game on an alternate account (Now that the game is free, its easier for everyone to do the same too). 

If youre thinking of buying the game then dont, not only will you be cheated out of a win in games but you'll also be cheated out of your money as well. Sign up for ESEA or something if youre still commited to getting it.
Jeu excellent hormis les smurfs et les cheaters comme beaucoup d'autres jeux

Hackers in the game, EVERY game ive played in the past week has had hackers to a point this game is unplayable. This game becoming free to play ruined the game. The anti-cheat is a piece of s*** and even if someone does get caught for hacking, guess what? they can make a new account and keep playing. Add IP bans into the game since its now a free to play game valve... i can justify not doing that in the past because it made money and people would eventually come to understand they are wasting their money by hacking...
Such a trash game, so many hackers, no updates to take care of cheaters. Do not install
